mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND RESERVATION_TYPE = 'USER' AND RESERVATION_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+30, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HELPER_BOARD ( HELPER_SEQNO, USER_ID, HELPER_POSITION, HELPER_PRICE, HELPER_MATCH, HELPER_ADDRESS, HELPER_GENDER, HELPER_WANT, HELPER_TIME, HELPER_TEAMLEVEL, HELPER_PLACE_NAME, HELPER_STATUS ) VALUES( HELPER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{helperPosition}, #{helperPrice}, #{helperMatch}, #{helperAddress}, #{helperGender}, #{helperWant}, #{helperTime}, #{helperTeamLevel}, #{helperPlaceName}, '진행 중' )

INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_SEQNO, MESSAGE_RECEIVE_ID, MESSAGE_SEND_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_TITLE, HELPER_SEQNO ) VALUES ( MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{messageReceiveId}, #{messageSendId}, #{messageContent}, #{messageTitle}, #{helperSeqno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HELPER_BOARD SET HELPER_STATUS = '마감' WHERE HELPER_SEQNO = (SELECT HELPER_SEQNO FROM MESSAGE WHERE HELPER_YN = 'Y')
